items.headline: Why BlackRock may not need to pay a big premium for a $38 billion energy acquisition
items.summary_en: Shares in U.S. power company AES Corp. spiked more than 15% in premarket trading Wednesday after BlackRock-owned GIP was reported by the Financial Times to have launched a bid worth around $38 billion.
